title: password encryption and saving the salt in database
body:
I am trying to save the salt in database along with the password. But every time i retrieve the salt from database i am not getting the same salt. for eg: if ia m trying to save it in database as "[B@14c31a0d" its getting saved as "56C2BB24C393EFBFBDC3B1E280A23718E2809A622DE28093C3A913EFBFBDC3A87DC39E20" and when i retrieve the password i am not getting the same salt. instead of that i am getting as "[B@25m25a0d". i am saving the salt as varchar in database.

please tell me how to save the salt in database so that i can get the same salt back.
